summary: DAEWOO MOTOR AMERICA INC. 1055 W. VICTORIA ST., COMPTON CA, 90220-8070.  877-362-1234. CONSUMER STATES ON JANUARY 11TH, RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER FOR FRONT BRAKE HOSE REPLACEMENT 02 V 257 000. THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN MAKING A WEIRD NOISE,  AND DEALER STILL CAN'T PROVIDE PARTS.  MECHANIC STATED  IF HOSE RUPTURES, IT COULD RESULT IN LOSS  OF BRAKE FLUID AND NO BRAKES.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
